db:abstract.db:para: Unicode License Agreement - Data Files and Software (2016).

db:article.db:para: The Unicode Character Database (UCD) is a set of files that define the Unicode character properties and internal mappings.
Qt Core uses data obtained from UCD files for working with characters and strings.
The sources can be found in qtbase/src/corelib/text/qunicodetables_p.h and qtbase/src/corelib/text/qunicodetables.cpp.
Unicode License Agreement - Data Files and Software (2016).
